allow: Bash(# 为 wordbook 创建 API key curl -s -X POST ""http://litellm.tail2984bd.ts.net/key/generate"" \\ -H ""Authorization: Bearer sk-litellm-c377605116be4a25b533729f991fb07d"" \\ -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \\ -d ''{ ""key_alias"": ""wordbook"", ""max_budget"": 50.0, ""metadata"": {""app"": ""wordbook"", ""description"": ""单词本应用""} }'')
Bash(# 获取所有 key 的详细信息 curl -s ""http://litellm.tail2984bd.ts.net/key/list"" \\ -H ""Authorization: Bearer sk-litellm-c377605116be4a25b533729f991fb07d"")

Bash(# 为 ai-weekly 创建 API key echo ""=== Creating key for ai-weekly ==="" curl -s -X POST ""http://litellm.tail2984bd.ts.net/key/generate"" \\ -H ""Authorization: Bearer sk-litellm-c377605116be4a25b533729f991fb07d"" \\ -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \\ -d ''{""key_alias"": ""ai-weekly"", ""max_budget"": 50.0}'')

Bash(# 为 frontend 创建 API key curl -s -X POST ""http://litellm.tail2984bd.ts.net/key/generate"" \\ -H ""Authorization: Bearer sk-litellm-c377605116be4a25b533729f991fb07d"" \\ -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \\ -d ''{""key_alias"": ""frontend"", ""max_budget"": 20.0}'')
Bash(for pod in minio-pool-0-0 minio-pool-0-1 minio-pool-0-2 minio-pool-0-3)
